metadata.name: The Battle Within
metadata.description:
"The battle within is a reflection of the myriad struggles and phases that we experience in our everyday lives. It is a testament to our inherent dynamism and constant evolution. We are never stagnant, but rather, in a state of perpetual transformation, as we navigate the ebbs and flows of our existence."

Enkae

I am delighted to announce the release of a special inaugural drop of my first full 3D rendered scene, of which only 111 copies will ever exist. This unique offering grants exclusive access to all my future drops and perks.

As a proud member of the Web3 community, my primary objective is to bring together individuals who share similar values and possess a kind heart. With no lofty promises, I present to you my art and an unwavering passion to unite the very best of Web3.

Thank you for considering my work.
